description:
If possible, use Hexchat instead. Hexchat is a fork of Xchat that is still maintained. (As of July 2017, it looks like Xchat's last release was in 2010).

That said, if you must use Xchat, it was in its day an excellent graphical IRC client. I'm sure it still is. It does everything I've ever needed, and then some. The best part is that the configuration options are unusually easy to understand; everything just makes sense. The UI is good, too.
Looks good to me. Simple and useful.
XChat is ancient, depricated, and has not been developed in several years. It should not be in this list for those reasons.
probleme technique, pas de soucis avec hexchat
summary: impossible de se connecter sous ubuntu 20
